weekly_top_story.headline: Father and Son Kill 15 in Mass Shooting at Hanukkah Celebration on Bondi Beach
weekly_top_story.summary: A father-son duo carried out a mass shooting at a Hanukkah event in Sydney, Australia, killing 15 including children and a Holocaust survivor, prompting national debates on gun control and hate speech laws amid possible Islamic State links.

stories.headline: Saudi Arabia quietly expands access to its only alcohol store for non-Muslim residents
stories.summary: Saudi Arabia has broadened legal alcohol access to non-Muslim Premium Residency holders at its sole store, signaling subtle social reforms in the conservative kingdom.

stories.headline: At least 8 dead and dozens wounded in Russian strike on Ukraine's Odesa port
stories.summary: A Russian missile hit Odesa port infrastructure, killing eight and injuring 27, escalating the conflict and disrupting vital Black Sea trade routes.
